title: Jim West Schrift
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202846im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JimWest-Schrift_4934.png)

Not the best image to show my own version of this weird but beautiful script style, inspired on 1883 James West "Hoyt Script", here I just try to do a very wide range of alternate gliph designs, and hope to have some digital examples to show all of you here or anywhere.

Any kind of criticism are very well welcomed.
author: peggo

comments.content: Btw, the original specimen of "Hoyt Script" is available at: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51266334@N08/11364781176/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202846/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/51266334@N08/11364781176/)
